page.title: 12Village Life in General cont
page.content: The village would unite together to celebrate national occassions. The schoo held a party for the Royal Wedding and a Service of Thanksgiving wa held when the village school was reprevied from closure.The approach and food not quite like that of the past celebrations when boiled ham and tongue sandwiches would be organised and the children would enjoy a ride on swing boats and hobby horses. Today the school is the focal point for Christmas and Easter Celebrations and the Community Centre the main meeting place for entertainment.The annual carnival and crowning of the Cente Queen take place in July. During the year she will represent the village in other local events.This year all the children in the retinue attend the local school and Rebecca Slinn is Queen.
